commit.message:
except.c: Use rtx_sequence

gcc/
2014-08-27  David Malcolm  <dmalcolm@redhat.com>

	* except.c (can_throw_external): Strengthen local "seq" from rtx
	to rtx_sequence *.  Use methods of rtx_sequence.
	(insn_nothrow_p): Likewise.

From-SVN: r214593

+	(insn_nothrow_p): Likewise.
